other_tests.findings: Irregular Z line, erythema and friability at the GE junction consistent with esophagitis; erythema and friability in the stomach compatible with gastritis; erythema and friability in the duodenal bulb compatible with duodenitis; otherwise normal EGD to third part of the duodenum.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: Focal inflammatory changes in the right lower quadrant abutting the lateral aspect of the ascending colon and cecum; underlying colon notable for focal wall thickening and a prominent fecolith within its lumen; possible diverticulum noted.
